Text:
WHOOP WHOOP!! Thanks ninja - I downloaded another "ICP American Psycho Tour" file, and it was the movie American Psycho...I was all excited and ready to watch it - wack. 

Thanks from a treal-ass Juggalo who's been down for 15 years!
Thanks Ninja! I wanted to check this out before I bought it, so thanks for giving me the opportunity. Great video and sound quality. Much love!
